lines.text: here is a new commandment I give to you. That you love one another as I loved you. Surely it is not blasphemy to take that message to the shores of Africa or across the ocean sea.
You said my faith would light my way, yet all I see before me is a sea of darkness. Why your highness has God forsaken me?

[to the prostitute who tried to mug him]
Stick to your profession, beware the Genoese, and shun the Devil!
All my life I feel I've been chasing the sun, and at last I feel I'm going to catch it.

[after Alvaro has killed another Spaniard]
Now they know that we're not gods!
I always knew you weren't a god.
